events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering, specifically for the backend developer role.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process for the engineering team.
Initial phone screening completed, candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development and system design.
The candidate responded promptly to our screening questions and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview process.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 25th with the senior engineering team.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing excellent problem-solving skills and coding ability.
An HR interview has been arranged for the candidate to discuss company culture and benefits on May 28th.
Candidate completed the HR interview and expressed alignment with the company's values and mission.
A formal offer for the software engineer position has been sent to the candidate, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate responded with positive feedback and asked a few clarifying questions about the role and onboarding.
Candidate has formally accepted the offer and is excited to join the engineering team starting next month.
The onboarding process has begun, including equipment setup, orientation, and meeting the engineering team members.
Hiring process completed successfully; the candidate is now fully onboarded and integrated with the engineering department.
